name: The Higher The Lower
description:
Uncover what lies at the bottom, collect tasty beets and meet whacky characters on your journey downwards.

My second videogame and jam entry.

I had a blast participating in the Godot Wild Jam #39 and learned so much about the physics engine with this one!

Feedback is highly appreciated, I still have many funny ideas for this project, maybe I can polish it up, add more content and release it!

Writing was done in english, which is not my first language, so thank you in advance for any type of odd formulations you can point out to me. :D

Here is my twitter:

https://twitter.com/PlayfulProspero I sometimes post pixelart there.

Dialogue was created with the Dialogic Plugin (MIT License), check it out, it's awesome: https://github.com/coppolaemilio/dialogic

All music and art made by me with FL Studio and aseprite.
